q: This is a test of the new 20,000 character limit for production mode. We're testing to ensure that the translation service can now handle much longer texts than the previous 5,000 character development limit. This should allow users to translate entire articles, long documents, research papers, and other substantial text content without needing to split them into smaller chunks. The production mode configuration provides better performance and higher limits suitable for real-world usage. Lorem ipsum dolor sit amet, consectetur adipiscing elit.
